channel.title: Adding donator sign in from of name in chatbox?
channel.description:
Hey guys,
I need help with adding a donator sign before i the name of the person who donated.
I have all the codes right for when people donate just need to know how to add a sign before their name in the chatbox.
I need a img and kinda shown where to add the codes for it.
Thanks :D

item.title: Adding donator sign in from of name in chatbox?

[quote=“RsMakerWoad, post:3, topic:455480”]If its the chatbox from www.xat.com
That is not possible,
the reason why there is a Make Member in the chatbox[/quote]
LOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOL!!!~~!!!

item.source: Adding donator sign in from of name in chatbox?

item.title: Adding donator sign in from of name in chatbox?
item.dc:creator: @mthijs3 mthijs3
item.description:
@mthijs3 wrote:

In most cases, you just change the Donators ‘Character Rights’ or ‘Rights’ to 4 in the Donators character file.

0 = Player
1 = Moderator
2 = Admin
3 = Owner
4 = Donator

If that doesn’t work, find ‘isDonator’ or ‘isDonor’ in the Donators character file, and change the ‘0’ to ‘1’ .

If this doesn’t work check the Sprites folder in your client or cache, and look if there is a ‘modicon’ that looks like a donator sign.

Read full topic
item.source: Adding donator sign in from of name in chatbox?
